name: 陳世楷
objective: 隨著台灣農工型態的轉變以及越來越高的生活品質要求,地下水所扮演的角將日益重要,地下水的領域涵蓋水量,水質及防災三方面,修習此一學科,可以了解地下水水文及水力學之基本原理,進而掌握地下水水理與污染傳輸之特性,以作為規劃與管理地下水資源之依據.
schedule:
週次　　授課內容
1　　Introduction
2　　Hydrologic Processes 
3　　Basic Principles of Ground-Water Flow
4~5　　Basic Principles of Ground-Water Flow
Theory of Ground-Water Flow
6　　Theory of Ground-Water Flow in Unsaturated Zone and Fractured Media
7　　Response of Confined Aquifers to Pumping
8　　Leaky Confined Aquifers and Partially Penetrating Wells
9　　期中考 (40%)
10~11　　Response of an Unconfined Aquifer to Pumping
12　　Slug, Step, and Intermittent Tests
13　　Superposition and Bounded Aquifers
14~15　　Drilling and Electric Resistivity Method
16~17　　Basics of Transport, Advection, and Dispersion
18　　期末考 (40%)
materials:
教科書：
(1) Franklin W. Schwartz ; Fundamentals of Ground Water
(2) 地下水中文教材 
(3). Tood, D.K., 1959. Groundwater Hydrology, John Wiley & Sons Inc.
(4). Freeze, R.A. and J.A. Cherry, 1979. Groundwater, Prentice-Hall, Inc. Englewood Cliffs, New Jersey 07632.
(5) 曹以松：地下水,中國土木水利工程學會
